BasicInfo.short: Pubinno is a technology company that provides the beverage and hospitality industry with patented next-gen smart dispensers solutions.

Products.name: BeerPoint
Products.description: BeerPoint is connected beer dispenser. BeerPoint operates with prepaid cards. BeerPoint provides the same quality every time without waiting

Products.name: Taptronics
Products.description: Taptronics is a smart tap to provide same quality of beer. It prevents losses and frauds, tracks sales and inventory insantly.

news.title: Los emprendedores muestran en Barcelona el potencial del internet de las cosas
Pubinno créé la pompe à bière connectée et économe !
